full_summary:
### Notice Title
PASS SA – Stream 1, Internal Audit, Partner/Manager Director, Project Manager/Leader & Senior Auditor -- Internal Audit Advisory and Assurance Engagements.

### Notice Information

#### Solicitation Number
5000068859

#### GSIN
R010A
#### GSIN Description (English)
Internal and External Audits (Supply Arrangement PASS)
#### GSIN Description (French)
Vérifications internes et externes (Arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement pour des services professionnels de soutien à la vérification)

#### Procurement Category
SRV

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### End-User Entity
Environment Canada

### Description
This bid solicitation is being issued under the framework of the Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement (PASS SA). The purpose of this solicitation is to provide the following professional services:

*   Internal Audit Advisory and Assurance Engagements under Stream 1, Internal Audit

The period of the contract is from contract award to 31 March 2024.

### Selection Criteria
The basis of selection will be the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Security
There is a security requirement associated with this solicitation.

### Social Procurement
Environment and Climate Change Canada supports the Government of Canada's social and economic objectives, including increasing the participation of businesses from under-represented groups in government procurement opportunities. Suppliers owned or led by Canadians from under-represented groups, such as women, LGBTQ2+ persons, persons with disabilities and persons from visible minorities are encouraged to submit a bid to this opportunity.

### Contact Information

*   Michel Lariviere
*   Email: [Michel.Lariviere@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Michel.Lariviere@ec.gc.ca)
*   Location: 105 McGill 5th Floor, Montreal, QC H2Y 2E7
